comment.author: 42382619@N07
comment._content:
The person on the left is Philip C. Brooks, Sr., who had recently retired as the first director of the Harry S. Truman Library.  I think the person on the right is Alan Thompson, but I'm not sure.

PCBJr

Thanks for your help in identifying the subjects of these photos- we appreciate hearing from you!
